title: SDE
description:
**About Us**
 Livspace is Asia’s largest and fastest\\-growing home interiors and renovation platform. Leveraging its proprietary technology, the company delivers end\\-to\\-end home interior and renovation solutions, encompassing modular solutions, furniture, false ceilings, soft furnishings, décor, civil works, and more. The company serves homeowners across diverse market segments in India and Singapore.
   

  

 Since the company was founded in 2015, Livspace has revolutionized a highly fragmented industry by setting new benchmarks in quality, innovation, and execution. To date, the company has successfully transformed the homes of over 100,000 satisfied customers through its presence in 80\\+ cities and 110\\+ Experience Centres.
   

  

 Backed by marquee investors, the company’s goal is to continue strengthening its dominance in India as an industry leader and the largest employer of interior designers. Livspace remains committed to redefining industry standards by introducing new products and services, enhancing site execution processes, improving manufacturing techniques, and ensuring seamless project delivery—all with the ultimate goal of turning homeowners’ dreams into reality.
   

  

 For more information, please visit: https://www.livspace.com/in/about\\-us
   

  

**Job Description**
 We are seeking a talented and motivated Software Development Engineer I (SDE\\-1\\) to join our dynamic engineering team. As an SDE\\-1, you will be responsible for contributing to the development and maintenance of software applications. This entry\\-level position offers an excellent opportunity for professional growth and skill development.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Write efficient, well\\-documented, and maintainable code using best practices.
* Analyze and troubleshoot software defects and issues, providing timely resolutions.
* Contribute to identifying and implementing improvements in the development process.
* Work closely with team members, including product managers, designers, and other developers, to deliver robust and scalable software solutions.
* Develop and execute unit tests to ensure the reliability and correctness of code.
* Collaborate with quality assurance teams to identify and address software defects.
* Create and maintain technical documentation, including design documents, coding standards, and release notes.
* Actively participate in professional development activities and seek opportunities for continuous learning.
* Strong understanding of software development fundamentals and principles.
* Knowledge of data structures, algorithms, and object\\-oriented design.
* Excellent problem\\-solving and analytical skills.
* Good communication and collaboration skills.
* Ability to work effectively in a fast\\-paced and dynamic team environment.


 Job Requirement
   

  

* Bachelorʼs degree in a Computer Science related field or equivalent practical experience
* 2\\+ years of experience with software development
* Exceptional written and verbal communication skills.
* Experience with one or more programming languages (e.g., Java, Python, Go).
* Familiarity with version control systems (e.g., Git).
* Understanding of software development methodologies (e.g., Agile, Scrum)

title: Software Engineer in Test
description:
Cvent is a leading meetings, events, and hospitality technology provider with more than 4,800 employees and \\~22,000 customers worldwide, including 53% of the Fortune 500\\. Founded in 1999, Cvent delivers a comprehensive event marketing and management platform for marketers and event professionals and offers software solutions to hotels, special event venues, and destinations to help them grow their group/MICE and corporate travel business. Our technology brings millions of people together at events around the world. In short, we’re transforming the meetings and events industry through innovative technology that powers the human connection.
 



  





 The DNA of Cvent is our people, and our culture has an emphasis on fostering intrapreneurship – a system that encourages Cventers to think and act like individual entrepreneurs and empowers them to take action, embrace risk, and make decisions as if they had founded the company themselves. At Cvent, we value the diverse perspectives that each individual brings. Whether working with a team of colleagues or with clients, we ensure that we foster a culture that celebrates differences and builds on shared connections.
 



  





  





 About the role:
 



 Cvent is looking for multiple talented Software Developers in Test II (SDET II) to join our Technology team, which designs, develops and operates large\\-scale, Web\\-based applications and integrated mobile solution. This is a unique full\\-time opportunity for an individual who is seeking new challenges. In this role you will deliver technical solutions to ensure overall quality and integrity of scalable, high performance solutions for transaction\\-intensive web application and micro services. This Quality SDET team position plays an integral role for Sprint teams in providing technical and product feedback at all stages of the development life cycle.
 



  





**What you’ll be doing:** 




  





 Create end\\-to\\-end automated tests for comprehensive test coverage
 



  





 Design, develop, and implement performance and load tests.
 



  





 Troubleshoot and analyze the results of performance/load tests, sharing root causes with team.
 



  





 Improve code coverage of automated tests using code quality tools.
 



  





 Analyze and enhance the coverage of automated security and accessibility tests.
 



  





 Collaborate with Developers and DevOps to integrate automated tests into CI/CD pipelines.
 



  





 Assist in creating test strategy and plans.
 



  





 Provide usability and functional feedback to the product team.
 



  





 Assist sprint teams in raising overall quality and increasing velocity.
 



  





 Participate in Sprint scrum ceremonies, including grooming, planning, and demos.
 



  





 Collaborate with the Automation team to enhance Cvent's testing tools and frameworks.
 



  





 Bring up ideas and contribute to achieving high software quality goals.
 



  





**What you’ll need for the role:** 




  





 Possess a B.E./B.Tech/MCA regular degree from a reputed institute/university
 



  





 Have 2 to 4 years of relevant experience.
 



  





 Minimum of 1 year of hands\\-on experience in web application testing \\& writing automation tests using web automation frameworks like Selenium, Playwright, etc.
 



  





 Possess at least 6 months of hands\\-on experience in API automation testing.
 



  





 Proficiently use developer tools and IDEs, such as Intellij/Eclipse/VSCode and GIT.
 



  





 Demonstrate experience working in a CI/CD environment, like Jenkins, for executing and integrating automated tests.
 



  





 Possess strong troubleshooting and analytical skills for effective technical problem\\-solving.
 



  





 Possess good hands\\-on experience in developing and monitoring performance automated tests (using Gatling, Sitespeed, JMeter, or similar tools).
 



  





**Demonstrate good programming skills, with Java preferred.** 




 Demonstrate proficiency in leveraging AI tools and Generative AI technologies to optimize testing activities, like automation scripting, test data generation, and test case design, etc.
 



  





 Bring working experience with tools/technologies like Junit, TestNG, Jest, Karate, which is a plus

title: Frontend Developer
description:
**Intern to join us on\\-site Delhi** 

  




**Who can apply** 
* Graduate (B.E./B.Tech/BCA/BSc IT) or a 3rd\\-year student
* Available full\\-time and on\\-site (Mon–Sat) in Delhi



  




**You’ll work on** 
* Building modern, responsive UIs using
 **React / Next.js with TypeScript**
* Cross\\-browser responsive layouts and ensuring accessibility \\& performance
* State management (
 **Redux / Zustand** 
 ) and integrating with REST APIs
* Component libraries \\& styling using
 **Tailwind CSS** 
 (mandatory)
* Frontend testing (unit \\& component tests) using
 **Jest** 
 (and testing\\-library)
* Collaborating with Design \\& Backend to ship production features fast
* Working on modern front\\-end interactions (
 **GSAP / Spline** 
 or similar) for polished UI



  




**Must\\-have skills** 
* React \\+ Next.js, TypeScript, JavaScript, HTML \\& CSS
* Strong understanding of React fundamentals (props, state, hooks, lifecycle, reconciliation)
* **Tailwind CSS (mandatory)** 
 and component\\-driven UI approach
* Responsive design and cross\\-browser testing/compatibility
* Frontend testing:
 **Jest** 
 (unit tests) and testing\\-library familiarity
* **Git \\& GitHub** 
 (branching, PRs, basic CI awareness)
* Good problem\\-solving, clean code mindset, and basic UI/UX sensibilities



  




**Nice to have** 
* Familiarity with
 **Node/Express** 
 (reading/writing APIs) — plus point
* Experience or curiosity with modern 3D/animation tools:
 **GSAP, Spline, or three.js**
* Experience with state libraries beyond React context (
 **Redux/RTK, Zustand** 
 )
* Exposure to API management (caching, error handling, auth flows)
* Any small production projects or portfolio links



  




**Experience** 
* **2\\-3 years** 
 (Development Experience)



  




**Role \\& Logistics** 
* **Role:** 
 Frontend Intern (Full\\-time, On\\-site)
* **Stipend:** 
 ₹8,000 – ₹12,000 / month (based on experience)
* **Location:** 
 On\\-site — Delhi (workplace address will be shared with shortlisted candidates)
* **Working days:** 
 Mon–Sat



  




**What you get** 
* Strong mentorship, code reviews, and practical frontend engineering experience
* Internship certificate \\& strong LOR for good performance
* Exposure to modern web tooling and workflows

**Company:**

**About Pixeltalent Lab** 




 Pixeltalent Lab offers project\\-based internships designed to help aspiring software engineers gain hands\\-on experience in full\\-stack development, agile workflows, and collaborative coding. Our Software Engineering Internship focuses on building scalable web applications, writing clean code, and deploying real\\-world solutions using modern frameworks and tools.
 



**Role Overview** 




 As a Software Engineer Intern, you’ll contribute to the development of web\\-based platforms and internal tools. You’ll work across the stack — from front\\-end interfaces to backend APIs — and gain exposure to version control, testing, and deployment pipelines.
 



**Key Responsibilities** 



* Develop and maintain responsive web interfaces using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
* Build backend services and RESTful APIs using Node.js, Python, or Java

* Collaborate with designers and other developers in an agile environment
* Document features, workflows, and technical decisions using Git

title: IOT Engineer
description:
**Job Description – IoT Engineer** 

**Location:** 
 Coimbatore (On\\-site, Full\\-time)
 



**Experience:** 
 3–6 years
 


**About the Role** 

 We are looking for a talented
 **IoT Engineer** 
 to join our product engineering team in Coimbatore. You will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining IoT solutions that integrate hardware, firmware, and cloud platforms. The role involves working on connected devices, embedded systems, and mobile application integration to deliver reliable, scalable, and high\\-performance IoT products.
 


**Key Responsibilities** 
* Design and develop
 **firmware for IoT devices** 
 (C/C\\+\\+/MicroPython).
* Implement secure and scalable
 **IoT communication protocols** 
 (Wi\\-Fi, Bluetooth LE, MQTT, WebSockets, REST APIs).
* Integrate hardware with
 **cloud backends** 
 (Firebase, AWS IoT, or Azure IoT).
* Collaborate with mobile app and cloud teams to ensure smooth end\\-to\\-end data flow.
* Conduct
 **QA/testing** 
 for edge cases like power/Wi\\-Fi loss and hardware outages.
* Optimize architecture for
 **multi\\-device and multi\\-location management** 
 .
* Provide ongoing support for bug fixes, OS updates, and product improvements.
* Work with cross\\-functional teams (BA, QA, Mobile Engineers) to deliver new features and enhancements.


**Requirements** 
* **3–6 years** 
 of experience in IoT engineering or embedded systems development.
* Strong skills in
 **embedded firmware (C/C\\+\\+/RTOS)** 
 and debugging.
* Proficiency in IoT connectivity and protocols (
 **Wi\\-Fi, BLE, MQTT, REST APIs** 
 ).
* Experience with
 **cloud IoT platforms** 
 (AWS IoT, Firebase, Azure IoT).
* Familiarity with
 **mobile app integration** 
 (iOS/Android) for IoT products.
* Strong understanding of
 **circuit monitoring, sensors, or device telemetry** 
 .
* Excellent problem\\-solving and analytical skills.


**Good to Have** 
* Experience with
 **energy monitoring, metering, or submetering devices** 
 .
* Hands\\-on exposure to
 **current transformers, smart panels, or connected appliances** 
 .
* Prior work on
 **B2C/B2B IoT products** 
 with a scaling roadmap.

 Pixeltalent Lab offers practical, project\\-based internships that help aspiring developers build real\\-world web applications. Our Web Developer Internship is designed to strengthen your front\\-end and back\\-end development skills while contributing to live projects in a collaborative environment.
 



**Role Overview** 




 As a Web Developer Intern, you’ll work on designing, developing, and deploying responsive websites and web applications. You’ll gain hands\\-on experience with modern web technologies and development workflows.
 



**Key Responsibilities** 



* Develop responsive websites using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
* Work with frameworks such as React, Vue, or Bootstrap
* Build and integrate backend services using Node.js, Python, or PHP
* Connect front\\-end interfaces with RESTful APIs
* Optimize web performance and ensure cross\\-browser compatibility
* Collaborate with designers and developers on live projects



**Requirements** 



* Pursuing or recently completed a degree in Computer Science, Web Development, or a related field
* Proficiency in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
* Familiarity with front\\-end frameworks (React, Vue) and basic backend technologies
* Understanding of REST APIs and version control (Git)
* Strong problem\\-solving skills and attention to detail
* Ability to work independently and in team environments



**What You’ll Gain** 



* Hands\\-on experience building and deploying web applications
* Internship Completion Certificate
* Letter of Recommendation for top performers
* Exposure to full\\-cycle web development workflows
* A portfolio of completed web projects

title: Next.JS Engineer
description:
**About KoinBX** 











 KoinBX is one of the leading FIU\\-registered centralized cryptocurrency exchange founded in India, operating successfully for over six years. We’ve grown steadily with a clear vision: to make crypto trading secure, simple, and accessible to users around the world.
 



 Our platform supports a wide range of digital assets and is known for its strong security framework, intuitive user experience, and commitment to transparency. With a growing global user base, KoinBX is building a trusted ecosystem where traders and investors can confidently engage with the future of finance.
 



 As we continue to lead the charge in the Web3 revolution, we’d love to have you on board
 
 !
 
 Join our team of passionate innovators who are pushing boundaries and shaping the future of Web3\\. Together, we’ll simplify the complex, unlock the inaccessible, and turn the impossible into reality.
 



  





**Inside KoinBX’s Engineering Team** 




 Our Engineering team is the backbone of KoinBX's cutting\\-edge products and platforms. We take on complex challenges to develop scalable, secure, and high\\-performance solutions that drive the future of digital finance. If you're an engineer passionate about innovation and solving real\\-world problems, come be a part of the team shaping the future of Web3 technology.
 



  





**You’ll be diving into these tasks:** 




  






 ●
 
  Designing, developing, and implementing web applications using Next.js and related front\\-end technologies, such as React, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
 



 ● Collaborating with cross\\-functional teams, including designers, front\\-end developers, and product managers, to gather and refine requirements, ensuring alignment with overall business goals and client needs
 



 ● Writing clean, maintainable, and well\\-structured code, adhering to best practices and industry standards for Next.js development
 



 ● Optimizing web applications for maximum performance, compatibility, and responsiveness across various platforms and devices
 



 ● Performing thorough testing and debugging of Next.js applications to ensure optimal functionality, reliability, and security
 



 ● Developing and maintaining technical documentation, including design documents, user guides, and API specifications, to effectively communicate complex concepts to both technical and non\\-technical stakeholders
 



 ● Staying up to date with the latest advancements in Next.js, React, and front end web development technologies, and identifying opportunities to enhance existing applications or create new ones
 



 ● Providing technical mentorship and guidance to junior team members 
 



  





**Bring these HODL\\-worthy skills to the table:** 




  






 ●
 
 You have proven experience developing web applications using Next.js and React, with a strong understanding of their features and best practices ● You are proficient in front\\-end web technologies such as HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, as well as experience with modern JavaScript frameworks and libraries
 



 ● You have strong knowledge of web development best practices, including responsive design, cross\\-browser compatibility, and performance optimization
 



 ● You are familiar with version control systems, such as Git
 



 ● You are experienced with build tools and bundlers, such as Webpack or Babel is a plus
 



 ● You are familiar with testing frameworks and libraries. Such as Jest, React Testing Library, or Enzyme
 



 ● You possess knowledge of state management libraries, such as Redux or MobX
 



 ● You are familiar with server\\-side technologies, such as Node.js or Express.js
 



 ● You have a knowledge of agile software development methodologies. Scrum or Kanban is preferred
 



 ● You have excellent problem\\-solving skills, with the ability to think critically and creatively to develop innovative web solutions
 



 ● You possess a proactive mindset, with the ability to work independently and collaboratively in a fast\\-paced, dynamic environment
 



  





**You could be the key element our team needs:** 




 ● You have an insatiable curiosity for Web3 and VDAs, constantly exploring new trends and insights.
 



 ● The fast\\-paced crypto space energizes you and keeps you motivated to learn and grow.
 



 ● You’re proactive by nature, always aiming to make meaningful contributions.
 



 ● Collaboration is at your core—you value shared success over individual credit.
 



 ● You see change not as a challenge, but as an opportunity to innovate and evolve.
 



 ● You're a creative thinker who thrives on pushing limits and redefining what’s possible.
 



  







**Why Join KoinBX?** 




 ● Contribute to the evolution of the cryptocurrency industry.
 



 ● Develop customer\\-facing technology products for global users.
 



 ● Work in a performance\\-driven environment that values ownership and innovation.
 



 ● Gain exposure to cutting\\-edge technologies with a steep learning curve.
 



 ● Experience a meritocratic, transparent, and open work culture free from politics.
 



 ● High visibility in the global Blockchain ecosystem.
 










 Perks \\& Benefits at KoinBX
 




 ● Exciting and challenging work environment.
 



 ● Opportunity to work with highly skilled professionals.
 



 ● Team events and celebrations.
 



 ● A dynamic and growth\\-oriented career path. Join us and be a part of the revolution in the cryptocurrency industry!

title: Freelance – Golang Developer with Resilient Framework & T-SQL Experience(Remote)
description:
**Company Description** 




 ThreatXIntel is a startup cyber security company dedicated to protecting businesses and organizations from cyber threats. Our team of experienced professionals offers a range of services, including cloud security, web and mobile security testing, cloud security assessment, and DevSecOps. We deliver customized, affordable solutions to meet the specific needs of our clients, ensuring they have access to high\\-quality cyber security services. At ThreatXIntel, we take a proactive approach to security, continuously monitoring and testing digital environments to identify vulnerabilities before they can be exploited.
 



  





 We are seeking a
 **Freelance Golang Developer** 
 with strong experience in
 **building resilient, high\\-performance applications** 
 and working with
 **data services using T\\-SQL** 
 . This is a hands\\-on role where you will work on backend services, implement fault\\-tolerant frameworks, and integrate with relational databases.
 



 The ideal candidate has
 **5\\+ years of experience** 
 in Golang development, designing resilient systems, and building data\\-driven services with SQL Server/T\\-SQL
 



  





**Key Responsibilities** 



* Develop
 **backend services and applications in Golang** 
 , following best practices and clean code standards.
* Implement
 **resilient frameworks/patterns** 
 for fault tolerance, retries, circuit breakers, and high availability.
* Design and maintain
 **data services** 
 , including writing T\\-SQL queries, stored procedures, and optimizing database performance.
* Collaborate with cross\\-functional teams to integrate applications with relational databases and external services.
* Troubleshoot, debug, and optimize applications and data pipelines.
* Ensure
 **high code quality, performance, and reliability** 
 across applications.



**Required Skills \\& Qualifications** 



* Strong
 **Golang development experience** 
 (backend systems, APIs, automation).
* Hands\\-on experience with
 **resilient/fault\\-tolerant frameworks** 
 .
* Solid experience in
 **SQL Server / T\\-SQL** 
 , including writing complex queries, stored procedures, and working with data services.
* Familiarity with
 **REST APIs** 
 and integrating with other systems.
* Experience with
 **CI/CD pipelines** 
 and development best practices.
* Strong problem\\-solving, debugging, and communication skills.



  





**Preferred Qualifications** 



* Experience in
 **cloud environments** 
 (AWS, Azure, or GCP).
* Knowledge of
 **distributed systems** 
 or
 **microservices architecture** 
 .
* Prior freelance/remote project experience.
